answer_to_complaint.description: Answer to Complaint must be filed within 30 days after service of summons (CCP § 412.20)
exceptions: Extended to 60 days if defendant is served outside California
Extended to 90 days if defendant is served outside the United States

motion_to_dismiss.description: Demurrer or Motion to Dismiss must be filed within 60 days of appearance or before filing answer, whichever is earlier
exceptions: May be filed with answer if no prior opportunity to demur

interrogatories.description: Response to Form Interrogatories and Request for Production must be served within 30 days (CCP § 2030.260)

requests_for_admission.description: Response to Requests for Admission must be served within 30 days (CCP § 2033.250)

deposition_notice.description: Notice of deposition must be served at least 10 days before deposition date (CCP § 2025.270)

motion_filing.description: Notice of motion must be served at least 16 court days before hearing (CCP § 1005)
exceptions: Extended by 5 days if served by mail
Extended by 2 days if served electronically

appeal_deadline.description: Notice of Appeal must be filed within 60 days after service of Notice of Entry of Judgment (CRC 8.104)

notice_period.description: Ex parte applications require at least 24 hours notice to opposing counsel (CRC 3.1203)

filing_time.description: Ex parte applications must be filed by 10:00 AM on the day before the hearing
filing_time.statute: Local Rules may vary by county

requirements: Declaration of efforts to notify opposing counsel
Proof of service on opposing counsel
Leave of court after showing of due diligence
Service on competent adult at home or workplace
Mailing copy to defendant's last known address

service_by_mail.description: Service by mail extends response time by 5 calendar days

electronic_service.description: Electronic service extends response time by 2 calendar days
